jobDescription: Oversee construction projects from conception to completion.
responsibilites: Manage resources, schedules, financials, and adhere to quality and control guidelines.
Ensure compliance with safety regulations.
skillsExperience: 5+ years of experience in project management within the construction industry.

jobDescription: Provide technical advice and support on construction projects.
responsibilites: Liaise with site managers, clients, and sub-contractors.
Ensure that all materials used and work performed are in accordance with specifications.
skillsExperience: Degree in Civil Engineering or related field.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

jobDescription: Manage all costs relating to building and civil engineering projects.
responsibilites: Prepare cost estimates and budgets.
Monitor project costs to ensure the budget is not exceeded.
skillsExperience: RICS accredited degree in quantity surveying.

jobDescription: Design new buildings and the spaces in and around them.
responsibilites: Meet with clients to discuss project objectives, needs, and budgets.
Create detailed drawings and specifications.

jobDescription: Oversee construction sites and ensure projects are completed on time and within budget.
responsibilites: Supervise and coordinate the work of contractors and subcontractors.
Ensure health and safety regulations are followed.

jobDescription: Ensure health and safety regulations are adhered to on construction sites.
responsibilites: Conduct regular site inspections.
Develop health and safety policies and procedures.
skillsExperience: Strong knowledge of health and safety legislation.

jobDescription: Plan, design, and oversee construction and maintenance of building structures and infrastructure.
responsibilites: Manage construction projects.
Analyze survey reports, maps, and other data.

jobDescription: Plan and coordinate construction projects to ensure timely and cost-effective completion.
responsibilites: Develop project schedules.
Coordinate with project managers and site supervisors.

jobDescription: Design, develop, and maintain electrical systems for buildings and infrastructure.
responsibilites: Prepare electrical drawings and specifications.
Ensure compliance with electrical codes and standards.

jobDescription: Design and assess structures to ensure they are safe and capable of withstanding the elements.
responsibilites: Analyze configurations of the basic components of a structure.
Liaise with other designers and professionals to agree on safe designs.
skillsExperience: Proficiency in design and analysis software.

jobDescription: Construct and repair walls, partitions, arches, and other structures.
responsibilites: Lay bricks, blocks, and stones.
Read and interpret building plans.

jobDescription: Install, maintain, and repair plumbing systems in buildings.
responsibilites: Install and repair water supply lines, waste disposal systems, and related appliances.
Inspect plumbing systems and identify issues.
skillsExperience: Experience in residential and commercial plumbing.

jobDescription: Construct, install, and repair structures and fixtures made of wood and other materials.
responsibilites: Measure, cut, and shape wood, plastic, and other materials.
Install structures and fixtures, such as windows and molding.
skillsExperience: Proficiency with carpentry tools and techniques.

jobDescription: Install and repair roofs on residential and commercial buildings.
responsibilites: Install, repair, and replace roofing systems.
Inspect roof damage and determine the best repair solutions.
skillsExperience: Ability to work at heights safely.

jobDescription: Install, maintain, and repair electrical systems in buildings.
responsibilites: Install and repair electrical wiring, systems, and fixtures.
Inspect electrical components, such as transformers and circuit breakers.
skillsExperience: Knowledge of electrical systems and safety standards.

jobDescription: Apply plaster to walls and ceilings to create smooth finishes.
responsibilites: Mix plaster to desired consistency.
Apply coats of plaster to walls and ceilings.

jobDescription: Prepare surfaces and apply paint, wallpaper, and other finishes to buildings.
responsibilites: Prepare surfaces for painting or wallpapering.
Apply paint or other finishes using brushes, rollers, or spray guns.
skillsExperience: Knowledge of various painting techniques and materials.

jobDescription: Measure and map land and building sites to determine property boundaries and prepare for construction projects.
responsibilites: Conduct field surveys and record data.
Prepare maps and reports based on survey findings.
skillsExperience: Degree in Surveying or related field.
Proficiency with surveying instruments and software.

jobDescription: Estimate the costs of construction projects for bidding and budgeting purposes.
responsibilites: Prepare detailed cost estimates and budgets.
Analyze project requirements and specifications.

jobDescription: Perform physical labor on construction sites.
responsibilites: Assist skilled workers in performing their tasks.
Operate and maintain construction equipment.
